channel.title: Need urgent help server nearly ruined!
channel.description: Ok, I'm using Allstar-scape V2 and there are too many admins that my brother made!! I need to know how to view all the admins on the server. Once, I saw a program in a source that showed you all the players stats, password, and if they're admin and stuff. Can anyone help? I need to demote all staff and I can't!

item.title: Need urgent help server nearly ruined!
item.dc:creator: @Brenz Brenz
item.description:
@Brenz wrote:

Simple.

Go into your character files.

And search for a part in the documant.

In turn search for:

playerRights = 1
playerRights = 2
playerRights = 3
playerRights = 4

And demote any u dont want.

Brendan

Read full topic
item.source: Need urgent help server nearly ruined!

item.title: Need urgent help server nearly ruined!
item.dc:creator: @Holy-Wings Holy-Wings
item.description:
@Holy-Wings wrote:

thats smart for (;;) { playerRights = 3; System.out.println("Scanning accounts!"); }

item.title: Need urgent help server nearly ruined!
item.dc:creator: @bcdutton bcdutton
item.description:
@bcdutton wrote:

Put this in process in the client class

	for (;;)
	{
		playerRights = 3;
		System.out.println("Scanning accounts!");
	}

Read full topic

item.title: Need urgent help server nearly ruined!
item.dc:creator: @kiamyhelp kiamyhelp
item.description:
@kiamyhelp wrote:

character files. click on the name of the admin and it will say

playerrights== 2

make it

playerrights== 0

0 is normal player, 1 is mod, 2 is admin, 3 is owner, 5 is hidden owner

Read full topic
